# HMCharacteristicTypeSerialNumber

**Global Variable**

The serial number of the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
let HMCharacteristicTypeSerialNumber: String
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is a string.

## Deprecated characteristic types

- **HMCharacteristicTypeManufacturer**: The manufacturer of the accessory.
- **HMCharacteristicTypeModel**: The model of the accessory.
- **HMCharacteristicTypeFirmwareVersion**: The firmware version of the accessory.

items.description: The firmware version of the accessory.
